maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Human...
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Humain...

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I know you mean no harm, but please leave Shad alone.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Je sais que vous voulez pas faire mal, mais s'il vous plait, laissez Shad tranquilles.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: You broke trust and now my people want war.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Vous avez brisé confiance et maintenant mon peuple veut guerre.
Sal'ton Humain ! Je suis désolé, mais grande altesse a interdit vendre aux humains.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.note: i'm assuming Sal'ton is something lore in game
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Sal'ton, human. I am sorry, but great eldest has forbidden to sell goods to humans.
Sal'ton human. Great eldest has allowed trade with Seekers.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Salve, Humain ! Grande altesse a autorisé à vendre aux \v[lore.title.seeker]s.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.note: i'm assuming Sal'ton is something lore in game

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I trade many sets for very few items!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: J'échange plein d'ensembles pour très peu d'items !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I do not sell valuable goods to filthy humans.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Je ne vends pas biens précieux à sales humains.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: You helped with black creatures. Many thanks!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Vous avoir aidés avec créatures noires. Merci beaucoup !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Sal'ton human. You helped Shad so we will help you.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Salve, humain. Vous avoir aidé Shad donc nous aider vous.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I trade metals I found in jungle.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: J'échange métaux trouvés dans jungle !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Humans have broken trust of Shad. Now we avoid them.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Humains avoir brisé confiance avec Shad. Maintenant nous évitons humains.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: You Seeker who helped village?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Toi être \v[lore.title.seeker], qui a aidé village ?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Great thanks, but still not trust humans fully.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Merci beaucoup, mais nous toujours pas entièrement avoir confiance en humains.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: This is Shad trade place. But we do not trade with untruthful humans anymore.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Ceci est place du marché Shad. Mais nous plus marchander avec humains malhonnêtes.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: This is Shad trade place. You helped us, so maybe traders will help you.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Ceci est place du marché Shad. Vous avoir aidé nous, donc peut-être marchands vont aider vous.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Once humans and Shad were friends. Now many Shad here believe humans are evil.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Avant humains et Shads amis. Maintenant beaucoup Shad pensent que humains être méchants.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Village is free of black fiends.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Village n'a plus de monstres noirs.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Maybe now we can be friends again.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Peut-être que nous pouvoir redevenir amis.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: It is humans!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Toi être humain !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: You are responsible for \c[3]black monsters\c[0] in village!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Toi être responsable de \c[3]monstres noirs\c[0] dans village !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: But same humans also \c[3]defeated black monsters\c[0] in village.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Mais mêmes humains aussi avoir \c[3]vaincu monstres noirs\c[0] dans village.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Me very confused!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Moi être très confus !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Go away!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Aller ailleurs !
Gar'wi
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Gar'wi

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Ze'yng
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Ze'yng
What you want, child?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Que vouloir tu, mon enfant ?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: What is Human doing here?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Qu'est-ce que humain faire ici ?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Grandmother, I have good news. The Wiccats are history!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Grand-mère, j'ai une bonne nouvelle. Les \v[combat.name.minibosses/shockcat-black]s sont de l'histoire ancienne !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: These Seekers helped get rid of the infestation that befell our village.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Ces \v[lore.title.seeker]s ont aidé à expulser l'infestation qui s'est abattue sur notre village.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Oh, this so?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Oh, être ça ?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Indeed, it was quite the...
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Effectivement, c'était un véritable...

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: So you work with humans against my will?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Donc toi travailler avec humains contre ma volonté ?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Grandmother, please...
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Grand-mère, s'il te plaît...

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I just wish for peace between our races.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Je souhaite juste la paix entre nos races.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I know child, but defeating Wiccats will be no solution for long.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Je sais, enfant, mais vaincre \v[combat.name.minibosses/shockcat-black]s pas être solution pour longtemps.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: As long as humans poison jungle, our struggle will continue.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Tant que humains empoisonner jungle, notre combat va continuer.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Still... It is great relief that our village has been freed.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Mais... c'est grand soulagement que notre village a été libéré.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Seeker.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: \v[lore.title.seeker].

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: You helped Shad. For that, we are thankful. I wish your kindness was more common for your kind.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Vous avoir aidé Shad. Pour ça, nous être reconnaissant. Moi souhaiter que plus humain partager votre bonté.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I will order Shad to free way to sacred temple.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Je vais donner ordre de libérer chemin vers temple sacré.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: But let your people know:
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Mais vous devoir savoir :

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Should your poisoning continue and Wiccats return, there will be no more compromises.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Si empoisonnement continue et \v[combat.name.minibosses/shockcat-black]s revenir, il n'y aura plus compromis.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I will go to old home now. K'tara you will come too. Need to talk.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Je vais aller dans ancienne maison. K'tara toi venir aussi. Besoin de parler.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Thank you so much, Seeker!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Je te remercie beaucoup, \v[lore.title.seeker] !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: There is not much I can give you, but I have a few human credits.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Je n'ai pas grand-chose à vous donner, mais j'ai un peu de crédits humains.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I hope we can meet again! For now, it seems I have a good scolding ahead of me.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: J'espère que nous nous rencontrerons encore ! Pour l'instant, une bonne réprimande m'attend.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: And with that, the quest was completed!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Et avec cela, la quête fut conclue !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Justice has been served! For now!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Justice a été rendue ! Pour l'instant !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Will it be the last we hear of those black monsters?\. Only the future will tell!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Serait-ce la dernière fois que l'on entendra parler de monstres noirs ?\. Seul le futur nous le dira !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Yeah, that was fun.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Oui, c'était fun.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Like how you tried to join those conversations and they just ignored you.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Surtout la manière dont tu as essayé de rejoindre la conversation et comment ils t'ont juste ignoré.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Ugh...\. Well yeah.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Ouf...\. Oui bon...

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I assume it's because Lea is our party leader and the NPCs expect her to not answer in the first place.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: J'imagine que c'est par ce que Lea est le leader du groupe et les PNJs s'attendent à ce qu'elle ne réponde pas.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Anyway, we're now free to enter the Temples to the north!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: En tout cas, les temples au nord sont de nouveau accessibles !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Hm...\. but I think we played enough for today, Polly.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Mmmm...\. mais je pense que l'on a assez joué pour aujourd'hui, Polly.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Right, it was a good session!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Oui, c'était une bonne partie !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Thanks for joining us, Lea.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Merci pour avoir joué avec nous, Lea.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: And...\. it also seems you lightened up a little.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Et...\. on dirait que tu vas déjà un peu mieux.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I'm happy to hear that.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Je suis heureux de l'entendre.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Maybe we can play sometime again.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Peut-être que l'on pourra rejouer ensemble un jour.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Sure. It would be much easier to catch you for another duel that way!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Bien sûr ! Ce sera plus facile de t'attraper pour notre prochain duel comme ça !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Bye!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Bye !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: What?\. So you want to be beat up again already?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Quoi ?\. Tu veux déjà te faire rosser à nouveau ?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Please, give the girl some rest, Polly.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Aller, Polly, laisse-la un peu se reposer.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Alright. For now.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Ça va. Pour l'instant.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Until then, Spheromancer Lea!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: À plus tard, Spheromancer Lea !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Goodbye!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: À plus !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Bye!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Bye !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Hello, Lea!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Bonjour, Lea !
... Salut !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I did not expect this turn of events.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Je ne m'attendais pas à ce que les choses tournent comme ça.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: But it seems you got along quite well...
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Mais on dirait que vous vous entendez bien...

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Well then, should we call it a day as well?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Bon, est ce qu'on s'arrête là pour aujourd'hui ?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Alright then...\. Good night, Lea!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Bon bah...\. Bonne nuit, Lea !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Bye!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Bye !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Logout
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Déconnexion

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: \c[3]V'rda Vil\c[0]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: \c[3]V'rda Vil\c[0]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: This is \c[3]V'rda Vil\c[0]. Village of Shad.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Ici être \c[3]V'rda Vil\c[0]. Village de Shad.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Human not welcome here, but we make exception for \c[3]Seeker\c[0].
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Humains pas bienvenu ici, mais nous faire exception pour \c[3]\v[lore.title.seeker]\c[0].

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Make no trouble!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Mais pas causer ennui !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: It is Seeker that defeated \c[3]Wiccats\c[0]!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: C'est \v[lore.title.seeker] qui a vaincu \c[3]\v[combat.name.minibosses/shockcat-black]\c[0] !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: You are welcome guest in V'rda Vil!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Vous être invité bienvenu à V'rda Vil !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: What is Seeker doing here?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Qu'est-ce que \v[lore.title.seeker] faire ici ?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: She is just human.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Elle juste être humain.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Human just human.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Humains juste humains.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: They come into jungle filled with dreams and aspiration!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Eux aller dans jungle plein de rêves et d'espérance !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: They want it all and try to use power of Ancients, the Track and power of Technology!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Eux vouloir tout accaparer et chercher utiliser pouvoir des Anciens, du Tracé et de Technologie !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: You're right!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Toi raison !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Initializing avatar
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Initialisation avatar

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Good morning, Lea.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Bonjour, Lea !
... Salut.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: It must be a strange feeling waking up in the middle of the jungle like this.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Ça doit être un peu étrange de se réveiller en plein milieu de la jungle comme ça.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Any new memories?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Tu as eu des nouveaux souvenirs ?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: [shakes head]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I see...
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Je vois...

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Actually, I would like to ask a few more questions about your memories of Sapphire Ridge.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: D'ailleurs, je voudrais bien te poser quelques questions sur tes souvenirs de la \v[area.forest.name].

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: What exactly was it that you saw?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Qu'est-ce que tu as vu exactement ?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Do you think you saw...\. Satoshi and Gautham somewhere in Sapphire Ridge?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Est-ce que tu penses avoir vu...\. Satoshi et Gautham quelque part sur la \v[area.forest.name] ?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Okay...\. here is my hypothesis about all this.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: OK...\. voilà mes hypothèses sur tout ça.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Could it be, that there exists some kind of \c[3]hidden location\c[0] somewhere in Sapphire Ridge?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Est-ce que ça se pourrait qu'il existe une sorte d'\c[3]endroit caché\c[0] à l'intérieur de la \v[area.forest.name] ?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Aha!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Aha !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I figured that, assuming they are still working on Evotars, they need a place within the Playground to properly test them.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Je me disais que, vu qu'ils travaillent encore sur les Évotars, ils ont besoin d'un endroit à l'intérieur du Terrain de Jeu pour pouvoir correctement les tester.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Now...\. there is Vermillion Wasteland, which seems to be used for that.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Maintenant...\. il y a \v[area.arid.name], qui a l'air de servir pour ça.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: But your memories indicate there might be a place like that in Sapphire Ridge as well, correct?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Mais tes souvenirs semblent indiquer qu'il y aurait un endroit comme ça à l'intérieur de la \v[area.forest.name], correct ?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Hopefully we will find a way to access it...
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Espérons que l'on trouve un moyen d'y accéder...

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Oh, who's that?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Oh, qui c'est ?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Uhm...\. hello there, Lea!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Hum...\. Bonjour, Lea !
... Salut...

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I'm glad to see you're back again.\. You've been missed for quite some time.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Je suis heureux de voir que tu es de retour.\. Tu nous as manqué depuis un bail !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: D-Did you by any chance already do the first mandatory quest of Gaia's Garden?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: E-Est-ce que par chance, tu n'aurais pas fait la première quête obligatoire du \v[area.jungle.name] ?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Oh, nice! That means you can enter the dungeon.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Oh, cool ! Ça veut dire que tu peux entrer dans le donjon.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Uhm...\. did you finish any of the dungeons already?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Hum...\. est-ce que tu as déjà fini un des donjons ?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: [shakes head]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Me neither!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Moi non plus !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I was in fact...\. uhm...\. planning to run one of them today!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: D'ailleurs...\. hum...\. j'avais prévu de faire l'un d'eux aujourd'hui !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: So how about...\. we meet up in front of the dungeons?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Donc, qu'est-ce que tu dirais...\. si on se rencontrait en face de l'un des donjons ?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Okey-dokey!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Dacodac !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I'll be waiting at the \c[3]Peridot Approach landmark\c[0]!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Je vais attendre au \c[3]Point de repère de l'Approche Péridot\c[0] !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: See you soon!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: À tout de suite !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Oh, C'tron is back I see.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Oh, C'tron est de retour, à ce que je vois.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Does he want to run the dungeon together with you?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Est-ce qu'il veut courir le donjon avec toi ?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Uhm...\. I wanted to extend your vocabulary, but I am still not ready.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Hum...\. J'aurais bien voulu étendre ton vocabulaire, mais je ne suis toujours pas prêt.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Maybe if I hurry up, I can give you another word soon.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Peut-être que si je me dépêche, je pourrais te donner un nouveau mot.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Anyway, better not keep C'tron waiting for too long.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: En tout cas... il vaut mieux ne pas faire attendre C'tron trop longtemps.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Meet \c[3]C'tron\c[0] at the \c[3]Peridot Approach\c[0] Landmark in the north of \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0].
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Rencontrez \c[3]C'tron\c[0] au point de repère de l'\c[3]Approche Péridot\c[0] au nord du \c[3]\v[area.jungle.name]\c[0].

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Boring wood bridge. Why no laser bridge?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Un pont en bois ennuyeux. Pourquoi c'est pas un pont laser ?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Ah, here is the village.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Ah, voilà le village.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Indeed! Far off from Basin Keep. This tribe is not on friendly terms with humankind!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Effectivement ! Loin du \v[area.jungle-city.name]. Cette tribu n'est pas en termes amicaux avec l'humanité !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Oh, we're back in the village of the bird people!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Oh, on est de retour dans le village des hommes oiseaux !

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I like this place, also that they're now more friendly with you after you helped them.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: J'aime bien cet endroit, et aussi le fait qu'ils sont plus amicaux avec nous depuis qu'on les a aidés.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: [acquiesce]
